# smbdata

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides the data to the book by Welham et al. (2015) "Statistical Methods in Biology" added with acknowledgement and permission from the authors.

## Installation

You can install the development version of smbdata like so:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("emitanaka/smbdata")
```
